channel.title: No signlink?
channel.description:
I was trying to make a Webclient. I have a domain, but sence i cant fix the signlink.java or whatever its called i have no clue what to do... please help, and BTW if you want to reply search bar, or google, ive looked for like 4+ hours now...
*****UPDATE****** nvm found it, but i still need to know how to make a webclient, and i've looked for hours and there isn't 1 good tut i've found

item.title: No signlink?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“swebbyscape, post:1, topic:393015”]I was trying to make a Webclient. I have a domain, but sence i cant fix the signlink.java or whatever its called i have no clue what to do… please help, and BTW if you want to reply search bar, or google, ive looked for like 4+ hours now…

UPDATE*
nvm found it, but i still need to know how to make a webclient, and i’ve looked for hours and there isn’t 1 good tut i’ve found[/quote]

  1. Jar your client
  2. Upload your client to your webhost
  3. Search for the code on how to add an applet to a web page.

Read full topic
